pullRequest.title: Add more Sponge commands:
pullRequest.bodyText:
/sponge which (not witch, as some people were led to believe!)
/sponge version
/sponge plugin 

Also ensure suggestions that are returned get filtered by startsWith
Also also: generics are a bit better now
Requires SpongePowered/SpongeAPI#2181

nodes.bodyText: @Zidane I know you like final things, but this is intended to be overriden by SpongeForge to add any additional commands it sees fit, like /sponge mods, and injected via Guice (so it'll need an explicit binding on SF).

beforeCommit.message: This may as well be private.

afterCommit.message:
Add more Sponge commands:

* /sponge which
* /sponge version
* /sponge plugin <plugin>

Also ensure suggestions that are returned get filtered by startsWith

Also also: generics are a bit better now
